review: I'm very happy with the doctor the way he explained about the problem and treated. And doctor very friendly and very reasonable earlier I enquired in different clinics but I'm so satisfied with doctor conversation and treatment planning I will highly recommend. Thank you so much doctor.

review:
Honest recommendation for Doc, amazing confidence, knowledge, treatment process and most importantly steady hands while treating during root canal. He purely knows what he is doing and explains patient about comple process and advantages/ disadvantages. Risks and remediation. He ensures treatment is done both at his and patients satisfaction.

I absolutely recommend people around JP Nadar 7, 8, 9 th phase to go for this doctor without any doubt. ** ** *** **** ** **** ****
You can definitely relay on professional service. Very clearly explains in detail about the work what he is going to do and economical not much burden on your pocket.
